org.eclipse.viatra.dse.api.strategy.interfaces

Interface IStrategy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IInitialPopulationSelector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BfsInitialSelector, BFSSelector, BreadthFirstStrategy, DepthFirstStrategy, EvolutionaryStrategy, FixedPrioritySelector, FixedPriorityStrategy, HillClimbingSelector, HillClimbingStrategy, InitialPopulationSelector, InstanceGeneticStrategy, LocalSearchStrategyBase, MainGeneticStrategy, PetriGuidedStrategy, PredefinedPopulationSelector, RandomInitalSelector, RandomSearchSelector, RandomSearchStrategy

    public interface IStrategy
    This high level interface is responsible for defining basic operations of an exploration strategy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void explore()
      This method explores the design space as the implementation specifies.
      void initStrategy(ThreadContext context)
      Initializes the strategy with a specific ThreadContext.
      void interruptStrategy()
      The implementation of this interface should be ready to be interrupted.

    • Method Detail

      • initStrategy

        void initStrategy(ThreadContext context)
        Initializes the strategy with a specific ThreadContext.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.

      • explore

        void explore()
        This method explores the design space as the implementation specifies. It will be called only once, hence the exploration loop is run by the implementation. The termination condition is also specified by the implementation and when it returns the exploration thread will be disposed.

      • interruptStrategy

        void interruptStrategy()
        The implementation of this interface should be ready to be interrupted. If this method is called, the explore() method should return ASAP. This method is also called by the SolutionStore class if enough solutions are found.
